field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the name of the file.
field.required: You must enter a name for this file

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter a description for the file

field.label: Depositing as
field.hint: Deposit as yourself, or as a proxy for someone else.

field.label: Peer Reviewed
field.hint: Select "Peer Reviewed" if item is peer reviewed.

field.label: Display in Other Collections
field.hint: If you are also a depositor in another collection and you'd like to associate your work with it, you may select the collection(s) here (e.g. a thesis may be added to the general thesis collection as well as appear in the relevant departmental collection(s) ). This box will be blank if you are not a depositor in other collections

field.label: Author
field.hint: Enter the author's name (Family name, Given names).

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them here.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type of content of the item.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Depositing as
field.hint: Deposit as yourself, or as a proxy for someone else.

field.label: *Author(s)
field.hint: Names of the author(s) of this item. (* required)
field.required: At least one author is required.

field.label: ORCID iD
field.hint: ORCID iD(s) for author(s) of this item.

field.label: U-M Author Affiliation
field.hint: U-M Author's affiliation(s)

field.label: Other Author Affiliation, non-U-M
field.hint: Author's affiliation(s), non-U-M

field.label: *Document or Item Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item. (* required)
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Document or Item Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternate titles, please enter them.

field.label: *Date of Issue
field.hint: Use today's date if Deep Blue is this item's first place of publication. (* YYYY required)
field.required: You must enter at least the year (YYYY). Day and month are not required.

field.label: Source
field.hint: Journal name, book title, etc.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Use only if previously published (e.g., in a journal).

field.label: Peer Reviewed
field.hint: Select "Peer Reviewed" if item is peer reviewed.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: The citation for this item's previous publication. (e.g. Journal of X, vol. Y, no. Z, year, pp. m-n)

field.label: Series/Report No./Version
field.hint: Any series, number, version, or release assigned to this item.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has identification numbers/codes associated with it, please select the type(s) and enter them.

field.label: *Type
field.hint: To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Language
field.hint: The language of the main content. If the content does not really have a language (e.g. datasets or images) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Display in Other Collections
field.hint: If you are also a depositor in another collection and you'd like to associate your work with it, you may select the collection(s) here (e.g. a thesis may be added to the general thesis collection as well as appear in the relevant departmental collection(s) ). This box will be blank if you are not a depositor in other collections
